BugInstance.message: Method org.apache.shardingsphere.authority.checker.AuthorityChecker.isAuthorized(String) needlessly boxes a boolean constant
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.authority.checker.PrivilegeTypeMapper.getDDLPrivilegeType(SQLStatement) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.authority.checker.PrivilegeTypeMapper.getDMLPrivilegeType(SQLStatement) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.authority.checker.PrivilegeTypeMapper.getPrivilegeType(SQLStatement) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.authority.exception.UnauthorizedOperationException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.authority.provider.database.builder.DatabasePrivilegeBuilder.lambda$convertDatabases$2(Map, String) appears to call the same method on the same object redundantly
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.authority.provider.database.builder.DatabasePrivilegeBuilder.lambda$checkDatabases$0(String) passes constant String of length 1 to character overridden method
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.authority.provider.database.builder.DatabasePrivilegeBuilder.lambda$convertDatabases$2(Map, String) passes constant String of length 1 to character overridden method
